title: New: The Weekend Kids – Eastwood Rivals
content:
As much as I love dreamy, ethereal bedroom pop, every once in a while I ache for something slightly more, dare I say it, ‘rocky’ and this track from Jackson’s The Weekend Kids is exactly that.

Eastwood Rivals is nostalgic and upbeat, painting a perfect picture of adolescent disillusion and teenage angst, complete with a riff that The Drums would kill for. Let’s be young and in love forever. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
